<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 435, 719, 451]]<|/det|>
Write your Centre number, candidate number and name on all the work you hand in.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 451, 325, 466]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 467, 504, 483]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 483, 504, 498]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 498, 383, 514]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 530, 255, 545]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 545, 653, 561]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 561, 380, 576]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 576, 885, 607]]<|/det|>
